scripts.prebuild: cd packages/docs && yarn install && cd ../.. && cd packages/message-kit && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../..
scripts.build: yarn prebuild && turbo run build --filter='./packages/*' && yarn format:check && yarn typecheck --force
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .turbo && yarn cache clean
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules .turbo .next dist packages/**/node_modules packages/**/dist templates/**/node_modules templates/**/dist && yarn cache clean
scripts.copy: rm -rf packages/create-message-kit/templates && cd packages/create-message-kit && yarn copy && cd ../.. && echo 'Copy completed'
scripts.publish: turbo run build --filter='./packages/*' --filter='!./packages/docs' && yarn copy && changeset publish
